Room.Name: Courtyard
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a walkway reserved for the Prince and his administration.
Room.LongDescription: The walkway leads to the reviewing stand to the north and the center to the Lyanden Statue in the south. When the troops are assembled for inspection and the Prince comes from the eastern arch, this walkway is cordoned off and guards are stationed shoulder-to-shoulder along here. The walkway is at least 30 meters across, and is open to the sky above. As you look up you marvel at the heights of the towers rising into the clouds above. On the east side one tower in particular stands alone.
